content: this detailed lace/cabled cowl is knit from the bottom up and measures 15 by 5 5 inches fitting snugly the bottom button can be left open creating a cute split and more coverage below the neck it s perfect for peeking out of a coat or button it up keeping the warmth above a necklace i opted to make mine from a favorite yarn i handspun this is small enough to showcase yarn you ve saved for something special something you have but in small quantity gauge is important in snug items but i give you added tips to help get the fit right my neck measures 13 inches cowl measures 15 and 0 5- 0 75 is lost in buttoning it you should aim for 2 inches bigger than your neck measurement it will fit snugly with the overlap of the buttonband but will not be too tight treat yourself to an elegant couture comfort that you can fit in your purse or pocket for times when you need a little warmth color and pampering
